title: Frontend Framework Selection Decision Required
question: Which frontend framework (React vs Vue.js vs Svelte) should we use for the mobile-first PWA ERP system?

context.primary_user: Business owner on mobile phone (90% of operations)
critical_requirements: Record sale in < 30 seconds on mobile

human_response.reasoning: Owner selected React despite Vue.js recommendation. Factors may include: larger ecosystem, more available libraries, team familiarity, or long-term considerations.
accepted_tradeoffs: Larger bundle size (165-200KB) requires optimization work
Steeper learning curve for Django developers (2-3 weeks)
Tighter timeline (3 months achievable but no buffer)
mitigation_plan: Use code splitting and lazy loading to optimize bundle
Schedule 2-3 weeks training for Django developers
Use simpler state management (Zustand) instead of Redux
Leverage Vite for fast development builds
Use Material-UI for pre-built mobile components

resolution_notes: Business owner chose React 18 over recommended Vue.js 3. Decision locked. Will need bundle optimization strategy and developer training plan.
next_steps: Update DECISIONS.md with DEC-P01: Frontend Framework = React 18
Plan bundle optimization strategy (code splitting, lazy loading)
Research React-specific mobile UI library (Material-UI, Chakra UI)
Create developer training plan for React
